description:
Turn cold data into booked meetings with UK business owners.
You're not pitching fluff — you're opening doors for solar companies doing real business.
Your Target:

2–4 qualified meetings booked per day.
No recycled leads. No easy wins. Just straight-up outbound.

questions.question: Can you describe a successful cold calling campaign you have run in the past targeting UK business owners?
How do you typically qualify leads to ensure they are a good fit for the solar companies you represent?
Give an example of a challenging prospecting situation you've faced and how you overcame it to book a meeting.
What strategies do you use to ensure you meet the daily target of 2-4 qualified meetings booked with UK business owners?
How do you handle rejection or objections during cold calls? Can you provide an example?
Describe a time when you had to adapt your sales approach to successfully engage a difficult prospect.
What tools or software do you use for prospecting, lead management, and outreach? How do you leverage them effectively?
